description: Ex-Amnesty Turkey chief gets six years in ruling condemned as an "outrage".
title: Turkey jails Amnesty activists in 'terrorism' case
title_page: Turkey jails Amnesty activists in 'terrorism' case - BBC News
maintext: Andrew Gardner, in a tweet, also said there was "no evidence" for the conviction. "The torment continues. We won't give up until all are acquitted."
